content: the body and sleeves if you wish to have a longer sweater this cardigan is meant to hit at the high hip *designed by anne robinson* you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log into your account on our site and you ll see your completed orders from there you ll find the download link enjoy your knitting chandi new read about our pattern download process here 7 * life is about not knowing having to change taking the moment and making the best of it without knowing what s going to happen next - gilda radner* 1 https //www expressionfiberarts com/ 2 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/ 3 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/fingering html 4 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/fingering/north-fingering html 5 https //expressionfiberarts com/categories/fingering html 6 https //blog expressionfiberarts com/2025/12/05/knit-this-cozy-cardi-today-cindy/ 7 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/
